subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pierce Jones had three home runs and finished with four runs batted in as the Jackie Robinson West team beat Lynnwood, Wash., 12-2 on the opening day of the tournament.
snippet: Pierce Jones had three home runs and finished with four runs batted in as the Jackie Robinson West team beat Lynnwood, Wash., 12-2 on the opening day of the tournament.
